ISSUE.TITLE: Update REST API examples to current format
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Change Type Correction ### Area Integrations/API ### Proposed Changes Example: https://netboxlabs.com/docs/netbox/en/stable/integrations/rest-api/#brief-format shows `site` information ``` "site": { "id": 3, "url": "http://netbox/api/dcim/sites/17/", "name": "Site 23A", "slug": "site-23a" }, ``` for a prefix, but in NetBox 4.2.x the syntax is something like ``` "scope_type": "dcim.site", "scope_id": 1, "scope": { "id": 1, "url": "http://netbox/api/dcim/sites/1/", "display": "Test", "name": "Test", "slug": "test", "description": "" }, ```

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #19167: Update REST API examples (#19353) * Closes #19167: Update REST API examples * Fix missing description --------- Co-authored-by: Markku Leini√∂ <markkuleinio@users.noreply.github.com>
